description:
Inuyasha and the gang meet Gakusanjin, and learn that Naraku has stolen the Fuyouheki, a guardian stone.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Grande Pista para Derrotar Naraku
Der Schlüssel zum Sieg über Naraku
La pista definitiva para derrotar a Naraku
Naraku o Taosu Saidai no Tegakari
The Ultimate Key to Defeating Naraku
奈落を倒す最大の手がかり
